variables.name: CURRENT_YEAR
variables.description: This variable determines the current quarter. To be used as a dynamic filter in reports.

variables.name: CURRENT_MONTH
variables.description: This variable determines the current month. To be used as a dynamic fitler for reports.

variables.name: CURRENT_QUARTER
variables.description: This variable determines the current quarter. To be used as a dynamic filter in reports.
